articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Commonwealth Games: England's Ben Proud claims gold as Andrew Pozzi struggles
articles.description: England's Ben Proud defends his 50m freestyle swimming title as compatriot Andrew Pozzi falters in the 110m hurdles

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Commonwealth Games: England's Andrew Pozzi falters in 110m hurdles final
articles.description: England's Andrew Pozzi falters in the men's 110m hurdles final, finishing sixth with Jamaican pair Ronald Levy and Hansle Parchment winning gold and silver.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Watch: Canada v England basketball, boxing, athletics & swimming

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Commonwealth Games: Wales' Anna Hursey, 11, shines on individual debut
articles.description: Wales' Anna Hursey, 11, claims victory against Uganda's Halima Nambozo in her first match in the women's singles table tennis event.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Commonwealth Games: England's Luckman and Patel win Queen's prize gold
articles.description: England pair David Luckman and Parag Patel defend Queen's prize title, Wales win silver and Scotland take bronze.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Commonwealth Games: Wales' David Phelps wins 50m rifle prone gold for Wales
articles.description: Wales' David Phelps wins 50m rifle prone gold with a Games record score, as Scotland's Neil Stirton takes silver and Kenneth Parr picks up bronze for England.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Watch Commonwealth Games: Day six action from the Gold Coast
articles.description: Watch BBC TV coverage, in-play clips and follow text updates on day six from the Commonwealth Games on the Gold Coast.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Commonwealth Games: Scotland lose to Malawi in thrilling finale
articles.description: Scotland's Bethan Goodwin misses a chance to draw her side level after failing to convert the final penalty of the match as Malawi take a hard-fought 51-50 win in the netball.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Australia ball-tampering: 'Nonsense' only three players knew - Andrew Flintoff
articles.description: It is "absolute nonsense" that only three Australia players knew about the ball-tampering scandal, says ex-England captain Andrew Flintoff.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Man City v Liverpool: Pep Guardiola's team will have shackles off - Jermaine Jenas
articles.description: Can Man City overturn their 3-0 first-leg defeat? An early goal could be crucial, says MOTD pundit Jermaine Jenas
